revised_title: Deciphering Phoenician Numeral Characters and Dating Ancient Sidonian Coins
tldr: The author, John Swinton, explores the Phoenician numeral characters used in ancient Sidonian coins and makes a connection with the Palmyrene numeral system. By analyzing the characters on the coins, Swinton is able to determine the dates of the coins and establish a more accurate timeline for Sidonian history.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History
